Subject: Re: Netwrix Support Ticket #428288 -  - MAC devices not showing as Trusted - GIIFT    [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0Iqix3:ref ]

TextBody:
Hi Thanu,

Please ensure that the endpoint computer is included in a Content Aware Policy, this is the requirement for Deep Packet Inspection to be enabled on the machine.

In the Endpoint Protector client under "Troubleshooting", DPI should show as "Enabled", only then will the certificate "Available" and "trusted" reflect "Yes"



Regarding the duplicate users, please delete the users and observe if they came back after a while.


Kind regards
__________________
André Le Roux | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
www.endpointprotector.com
